info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

post.summary:
Login to FortiCloud.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

post.summary:
Login to FortiCare.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: FortiCare Account Registration
schema.description: Register the FortiGate to a FortiCare account.

forticare_error.title: FortiCare Error Message
forticare_error.description: If present in the response an error occurred while registering.

forticare_success.title: Successful
forticare_success.description: True when the registration is successful.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

serial.description: Serial number of an HA cluster member to register to login to FortiCare. Current device will be selected if not set.

agreement_accepted.description: Set to true if the end-user accepted the agreement.

is_government.description: Set to true if the end-user is affiliated with a government.

post.summary:
Transfer to a new FortiCare account.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: FortiCare Account Title Transfer
schema.description: Transfer ownership of the FortiGate from one FortiCare account to another.

forticare_error.title: FortiCare Error Message
forticare_error.description: If present in the response an error occurred while transferring.

forticare_success.title: FortiCare Success Status
forticare_success.description: True when the transfer is successful.

post.summary:
Register a device to FortiCloud through FortiGate. Currently FortiSwitches, FortiAPs and FortiExtenders are supported.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: Device FortiCloud Registration
schema.description: Registers FortiAPs and FortiSwitches to FortiCare.

success.title: Successful Registration
success.description: True when all device registrations has been processed, this could mean a failed or successful registration.

forticare_agreement.title: Agreement
forticare_agreement.description: The legal acknowledgment agreement terms and conditions.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

is_government.description: Set to true if the end-user is affiliated with a government.

agreement_accepted.description: Set to true if the end-user accepted the agreement.

post.summary:
Deregister the FortiGate from a FortiCare account.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: FortiCare Account Deregistration
schema.description: Deregister the FortiGate from a FortiCare account.

error.title: FortiCare Error Message
error.description: If present in the response an error occurred while deregistering.

success.title: Successful Deregistration
success.description: True when the deregistration is successful.

get.summary:
Fetch device registration status from FortiCloud. Currently FortiSwitch and FortiAP are supported.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: FortiCloud Device Registration Status
schema.description: FortiCloud registration status for a device.

time.title: Registration Time
time.description: Timestamp of when the device was registered.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: serials
parameters.description: Serials of FortiSwitch and FortiAP to fetch registration status.

parameters.name: update_cache
parameters.description: Clear cache and retrieve updated data.
